channel.title: Just wondering
channel.description:
When i run my server i get client type: low memory version
Ive been told this is because my ram is too little is this true? Also does anyone know on whats a recommended ram to run a server?

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @RACERDAN RACERDAN
item.description:
@RACERDAN wrote:

Yeah i know that it isnt powerfull enough but whats the recommended ram to get alot of people to connect to you. I can only get 3 at once. but i need a new computer anyway so i was just wondering on it.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2007, 07:45:51 AM[/size][hr]does anyone know?

Read full topic
